items.title: Go Outside and Touch Grass: 7 Inspiring Books About Nature and the Environment
items.description: Nature is good for you. Get the data, fire up your sense of wonder, and find inspiration to fuel your climate activism.

items.title: LEGO for Mystery Fans and More Mystery News!
items.description: A book nook for lovers of Sherlock Holmes, all the Best of So Far lists, thrilling adaptations, and more news from the world of mysteries and thriller...

items.title: Magical Meals: 7 YA Fantasy Reads for Foodies
items.description: These YA fantasy reads for foodies feature scrumptious bites, delightful drinks, and magical storylines to whet your appetite.

items.title: Cool Kids Read Books: Bookish Gifts for the Young Ones You Love
items.description: From bookish art prints to T-shirts that can “bookworm” up their wardrobe, there are so many ways to celebrate with bookish gifts for kids!

items.title: 5 Middle Grade Historical Fiction Books
items.description: These middle grade historical fiction books will whisk young readers across the globe and back in time, from 1960s Oakland to Partition-era Pakistan.
